Html: Not all developers use Visual Studio. And there is yet another great tool - Intellij Idea. If there was a TypeScript plug-in for this IDE - this would be great.

Thanks for the suggestion.  A good place to discuss this plugin would be with the Intellij community.  I believe there's a feature request here: http://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/WI-13714 that is tracking the request.
